verses.text: \w My|strong="H5921"\w* heart overfloweth \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* goodly matter: \w I|strong="H5921"\w* speak \w the|strong="H5921"\w* things which \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* made \w touching|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w*: \w my|strong="H5921"\w* tongue \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* pen \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* ready writer.

\w Thou|strong="H3956"\w* \w art|strong="H4639"\w* \w fairer|strong="H2896"\w* \w than|strong="H2896"\w* \w the|strong="H1697"\w* children \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w men|strong="H2896"\w*; grace \w is|strong="H3820"\w* poured \w into|strong="H1697"\w* \w thy|strong="H5608"\w* lips: therefore God \w hath|strong="H4428"\w* blessed \w thee|strong="H2896"\w* \w for|strong="H4428"\w* ever.

Gird \w thy|strong="H1288"\w* sword \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H1288"\w* thigh, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1121"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w*, \w thy|strong="H1288"\w* glory \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w thy|strong="H1288"\w* majesty.

\w And|strong="H2719"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H2296"\w* \w majesty|strong="H1926"\w* ride \w on|strong="H5921"\w* prosperously, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1368"\w* truth \w and|strong="H2719"\w* meekness \add and \add*righteousness: \w and|strong="H2719"\w* \w thy|strong="H2296"\w* right hand \w shall|strong="H2719"\w* teach thee \w terrible|strong="H1368"\w* things.

\w Thine|strong="H7392"\w* arrows \w are|strong="H1697"\w* sharp; \w the|strong="H5921"\w* peoples fall \w under|strong="H5921"\w* thee; \add they are \add*\w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* heart \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w*’s enemies.

\w Thy|strong="H4428"\w* throne, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God, \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w for|strong="H8478"\w* ever \w and|strong="H4428"\w* ever: \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sceptre \w of|strong="H4428"\w* equity \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* sceptre \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w thy|strong="H4428"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4428"\w*.

Thou hast loved righteousness, \w and|strong="H5769"\w* hated wickedness: therefore God, thy God, hath anointed thee \w with|strong="H7626"\w* \w the|strong="H7626"\w* oil \w of|strong="H7626"\w* gladness above thy fellows.

\w All|strong="H5921"\w* \w thy|strong="H5921"\w* garments \add smell of \add*myrrh, \w and|strong="H8081"\w* aloes, \add and \add*cassia; \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* ivory palaces stringed instruments \w have|strong="H8130"\w* made \w thee|strong="H4886"\w* glad.

Kings’ daughters \w are|strong="H8127"\w* \w among|strong="H4480"\w* \w thy|strong="H4480"\w* honourable women: \w at|strong="H1964"\w* \w thy|strong="H4480"\w* right hand doth stand \w the|strong="H3605"\w* queen \w in|strong="H8055"\w* gold \w of|strong="H4480"\w* Ophir.

Hearken, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* consider, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* incline thine ear; forget \w also|strong="H4428"\w* thine own people, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w thy|strong="H4428"\w* father’s house;

\w So|strong="H7200"\w* \w shall|strong="H5971"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* king desire \w thy|strong="H7200"\w* beauty: \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w he|strong="H1004"\w* \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w thy|strong="H7200"\w* Lord; \w and|strong="H1004"\w* worship \w thou|strong="H8085"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* daughter \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Tyre \add shall be there \add*\w with|strong="H4428"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* gift; \w even|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* rich among \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w people|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* entreat \w thy|strong="H4428"\w* favour.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H6440"\w*’s \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w within|strong="H6440"\w* \add the palace \add*\w is|strong="H6440"\w* \w all|strong="H6440"\w* glorious: \w her|strong="H1323"\w* clothing \w is|strong="H6440"\w* inwrought \w with|strong="H6440"\w* gold.

She \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* led \w unto|strong="H1323"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* broidered work: \w the|strong="H3605"\w* virgins \w her|strong="H3605"\w* companions \w that|strong="H3605"\w* follow \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w brought|strong="H4428"\w* \w unto|strong="H1323"\w* thee.

\w With|strong="H4428"\w* gladness \w and|strong="H4428"\w* rejoicing \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* \w they|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w led|strong="H2986"\w*: \w they|strong="H4428"\w* \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* enter \w into|strong="H2986"\w* \w the|strong="H1330"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s palace.

Instead \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w thy|strong="H4428"\w* fathers \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H4428"\w* \w thy|strong="H4428"\w* children, whom thou shalt make princes \w in|strong="H4428"\w* all \w the|strong="H4428"\w* earth.

\w I|strong="H1121"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w make|strong="H7896"\w* \w thy|strong="H7896"\w* name \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* remembered \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* generations: \w therefore|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* peoples \w give|strong="H1961"\w* thee thanks \w for|strong="H8478"\w* ever \w and|strong="H1121"\w* ever.
